8#include "src/bit_utils.h"
9
10#include <cstdint>
11
12namespace webm {
13
14std::uint8_t CountLeadingZeros(std::uint8_t value) {
15 // Special case for 0 since we can't shift by sizeof(T) * 8 bytes.
16 if (value == 0)
17 return 8;
18
19 std::uint8_t count = 0;
20 while (!(value & (0x80 >> count))) {
21 ++count;
22 }
23 return count;
24}
25
26} // namespace webm
27
